channel.title: Getting rid of AntiClient
channel.description:
Hey :D
On most Delta servers you may not use them with another client that differs from Bluurrs, or you will get various errors such as your head spinning around, your right-click combat level being incorrect, etc.
I would like to get rid of this AntiClient with Bluurrr implemented so I could be able to use the source with another client that is a 317 DEOB. Also if your wondering "Why are you working with Delta? EWWW", it's nothing like Delta anymore because I've edited it so intensely. I'm not saying, moving around objects or etc: The class files, every class file, is different, and I'd hate to leave my source.

item.title: Getting rid of AntiClient
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Rixxx:

I’m just curious about your “intensely edited” Delta… can you post source code?

I am going to use it to create a server, then release it on MoparScape when I am done. However I need this problem fixed to do so, as I am unaware what the AntiClient might be.

EDIT: Fixed the problem For anyone else having this problem go to appendPlayerAppearance in player.java and // out playerProps.writeByte(skulls); and playerProps.writeByte(hint);. You then have a Delta on a non-Bluurr client. Fucking thank god. (Bluurr is worse than delta!)

Read full topic
